resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-0dec-4114-2650-d82c6343944b#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hans Memling: Utolsó ítélet, 1466-71, Muzeum Narodowe, Gdansk, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, olaj, tábla.</string>
            <string language="en">Hans Memling: Final judgement , 1466-71, Muzeum Narodowe, Gdansk, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, oil, plate.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hans Memling: Abschließendes Urteil, 
1466-71, Muzeum Narodowe, Gdansk, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, Öl, 
Platte.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hans Memling : Jugement final, 
1466-71, Muzeum Narodowe, Danzig, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, huile, 
plat.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hans Memling: Julgamento final, 1466-71, 
Muzeum Narodowe, Gdansk, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, óleo, placa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hans Memling: Giudizio finale, 1466-71, 
Muzeum Narodowe, Danzica, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, olio, piastra.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hans Memling: Τελική κρίση, 1466-71, 
Muzeum Narodowe, Γντανσκ, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, 
πετρέλαιο, πιάτο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hans Memling: Juicio final, 1466-71, Muzeum
Narodowe, Gdansk, 223x72, 220x160, 223x72, aceite, placa.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Memling triptichonja a középkor egyik legtöbbet ábrázolt témájával, az Utolsó ítéletettel jeleníti meg a bibliai példázatot.</string>
            <string language="en">Memling’s tryptich represents the biblical parable with the Final Judgement, which is the most represented topic of the Middle Ages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">triptichon,  Utolsó ítélet,  ördögök,  angyalok,  15.század,  memling,  Hans Memling,  </string>
            <string language="en">tryptich, Final Judgement, devils, angels, 15th century, Memling, Hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Memling?s tryptich stellt die biblische Parabel mit dem 
abschließenden Urteil dar, das das dargestellte Thema des mittleren 
Alters ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tryptich de Memling?s représente la parabole biblique 
avec le jugement final, qui est le sujet le plus représenté des 
âges moyens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tryptich de Memling?s representa o parable biblical com 
o julgamento final, que é o tópico o mais representado das idades 
médias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tryptich di Memling?s rappresenta il parable biblico 
con il giudizio finale, che è il soggetto rappresentato di Medio Evo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Memling?s tryptich αντιπροσωπεύει τη βιβλική 
παραβολή με την τελική κρίση, η οποία είναι το πιό 
αντιπροσωπευόμενο θέμα των μέσων ηλικιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tryptich de Memling?s representa la parábola bíblica
con el juicio final, que es el asunto representado de las edades 
medias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tryptich, abschließendes Urteil, Teufel, Engel, 15. 
Jahrhundert, Memling, Hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tryptich, jugement final, diables, anges, 15ème siècle, 
Memling, Hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tryptich, julgamento final, diabos, angels, 1ö século, 
Memling, Hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tryptich, giudizio finale, diavoli, angeli, quindicesimo secolo,
Memling, Hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">tryptich, τελική κρίση, διάβολοι, άγγελοι, 15$ος 
αιώνας, Memling, hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tryptich, juicio final, diablos, ángeles, décimo quinto siglo,
Memling, Hans Memling</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
